titles.title: Glorify the Lord in the Fire

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Glorify the Lord in the fire.
Sing His praises in the dark of night.
Worship His holy name.
Make His praises glorious.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
O sing praises to His Majesty,
For the wondrous things He's done.
His mighty hand has brought deliverance.
Make His praises glorious.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The fire will burn away all that binds you.
You will find the fourth man in the flames.
A new song will arise,
To make His praises glorious.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Glorifica a Dios en el fuegoEn la noche oscura alábale.Su nombre Santo es.Da alabanza y gloria a Dios.Canta gloria a su gran majestad,Maravillas ha hecho él.Con mano fuerte él nos liberó.Da alabanza y gloria a Dios.El fuego quemará tus atadurasEn el fuego él allí estará.Un canto nuevo habráde alabanza y gloria a Dios.
